name: Fractured Sky
description:
Fractured Sky is first person Runner/Platformer in which you will experience how losing control can actually make you move forward and progress.

High speed, great graphics and emotional score will immerse you in a fantastic world of floating architecture and tricky movement puzzles that wouldn’t let go until you solve every single one of them.
There’s six unique fractured platforms that transforms or take your controls away.
Be fast. Be smart. Be creative. And maybe you will beat the final stage – ultimate challenge for most hardcore players.

Fractured Sky was made for the 2020 GMTK Jam by a team of 4.
Justin Greenstone, 3D Artist
Dima Radchenko, Music & SFX
Stephen Rodriguez, Animator
Timon Herzog, Programming
